Fold change, p value and vip of the data

Source: R/DM.R
DM.Rd

Fold change, p value and vip of the data

Usage

DM(mydata, group)

Arguments

mydata

the rows are metabolites, and the columns are the samples

group

the group information of the sample

Value

a data frame of the result contains fold change,p value and vip

Examples

diff_result <- DM(2**meta_dat,group)
#> OPLS-DA
#> 31 samples x 219 variables and 1 response
#> standard scaling of predictors and response(s)
#>       R2X(cum) R2Y(cum) Q2(cum) RMSEE pre ort pR2Y  pQ2
#> Total    0.485    0.864   0.697 0.194   1   1 0.05 0.05

diff_result
